metadata.description: Premium marketplace for revolutionary autonomous AI agents featuring four-tier architecture, intelligent pattern learning, comprehensive quality control, and full-stack validation with 80-90% auto-fix success rates.

plugins.name: autonomous-agent
plugins.description: Revolutionary four-tier agent architecture with 31 specialized agents, 23 skills, and 40 commands. NEW in v7.15.0: Systematic research capabilities with quality scoring (0-100), source credibility assessment, citation management, and frontend design enhancement eliminating 'AI slop' aesthetics (distinctive typography/colors/animations). Features pattern learning, quality control, full-stack validation, intelligent automation, and 80-90% auto-fix success. Production ready with 60-70% token cost reduction, comprehensive quality improvement, and fully autonomous operation.
